text:
March 22, 1956
TO;
Dick Underwood, Waldo Abbot
John Regnell, Jim Slack
FROM; Hugh M. Mix^vv
U. S. College Education^ British Students; Since this is a one-shot
deal and not a series, I vote no on the ground that it isn't worth the
trouble, I don't see that the program has any particular significance,
merely opinions are expressed and not necessarily informed ones. The
program is in the mud most of the time because it is recorded at too
low a level and because all the panel members have a tendency to mumble,
MESSAGES AND MEN; Vote yes.
BRITAIN TODAY; Vote yes.
